summary: SummaryHighlightsCruelty FreeKenra Platinum Heat Block Spray 22 is an ultra-fine finishing spray featuring unique Bee Propolis, a naturally-sourced resin providing unmatched thermal protection. This high hold, high shine, humidity-resistant spray perfectly refreshes any style throughout the day.
details: DetailsBenefitsProvides thermal protection up to 450 degrees FHigh hold finish for ultimate style longevityEnriched with Bee Propolis which forms a protective cast around cuticle for unparalleled heat protectionUltra-fine mist application dries on contactItem 2515976How To UseShake well. Hold can 8-10" away from style and spray evenly for all-day hold. Reapply throughout the day as needed.Precautions: Flammable. Contents under pressure. Avoid spraying in eyes. Do not place in hot water or near radiators, stoves or other sources of heat. Do not puncture or incinerate container or store at temperatures over 120F (50C). Do not use in presence of open flame or spark. Avoid fire, flame and smoking during use and until hair is thoroughly dry. Use only as directed. Intentional misuse by deliberately concentrating and inhaling contents can be harmful or fatal. Keep out of reach of children. Spray in a well-ventilated area. If adverse reaction occurs on skin or scalp, discontinue use and consult a physician. in case of accidental contact with eyes - rinse for 15 minutes. Consult a physician if problem persists.IngredientsAlcohol Denat, Hydrofluorocarbon 152A, Octylacrylamide/Acrylates/Butylaminoethyl Methacrylate Copolymer, Propolis Extract, Aqua/Water/Eau, Aminomethyl Propanol, Phenyl Trimethicone, Propanediol, Fragrance (Parfum), Panthenol, Limonene, Peg-12 Dimethicone, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsShipping Restrictions : This item cannot be shipped via air.
how_to_use: Shake well. Hold can 8-10" away from style and spray evenly for all-day hold. Reapply throughout the day as needed.Precautions: Flammable. Contents under pressure. Avoid spraying in eyes. Do not place in hot water or near radiators, stoves or other sources of heat. Do not puncture or incinerate container or store at temperatures over 120F (50C). Do not use in presence of open flame or spark. Avoid fire, flame and smoking during use and until hair is thoroughly dry. Use only as directed. Intentional misuse by deliberately concentrating and inhaling contents can be harmful or fatal. Keep out of reach of children. Spray in a well-ventilated area. If adverse reaction occurs on skin or scalp, discontinue use and consult a physician. in case of accidental contact with eyes - rinse for 15 minutes. Consult a physician if problem persists.

reviews.headline: I liked it!
reviews.comments: I liked it a fair amount. I think for the price, you're getting a great amount of product! I dislike the sticky feeling it gives my hair, but after I'm done heat styling my hair, it feels relatively normal.

reviews.headline: Bad smell, weird feel
reviews.comments: Has a very odd smell and made my hair tangly and feel gross

reviews.headline: TEXAS 1
reviews.comments: It did not hold up against the Texas humidity.

reviews.headline: Good but dries out hair
reviews.comments: I like the product. It has a good smell and doesn't make your hair too stiff. But I think for a heat protectant/finishing spray, it's still too hair spray forward. It makes my hair suppppppperrrrr dry unfortunately.

reviews.headline: Love this
reviews.comments: Idk what some of these comments are talking about this works so well with my hair. Please guys let your spray fully dry before you flatiron and this produt is not to be used as a heat protectant it is a HAIRSPRAY!

reviews.headline: Too much control for fine, thin hair
reviews.comments: I did not like this hair spray, was a little too heavy for my thin, fine hair.

reviews.headline: lies
reviews.comments: it really does nothing but dry out my hair so bad & makes it super tangled. no thanks. save your $

reviews.headline: heat spray
reviews.comments: holds so well!

reviews.headline: I love this product!
reviews.comments: I love this product. The only reason I didn't give 5 stars is the nozzle clogs easily.

reviews.headline: I love this product!! 10/10 recommend
reviews.comments: This product is so amazing best one I've found so far!!

reviews.headline: I love this product!
reviews.comments: I have a shorter style and oily hair. This product allows me to keep style for days with no oil and minimal touch up. Clean smell and great hold.

reviews.headline: Instant headache
reviews.comments: Saw this in TikTok and needed to try it with Tymo waver. The strong fragrance is headache inducing and made my face feel itchy. Thought the strong floral fragrance would dissipate but it didn't. My hair felt dry as well.

reviews.headline: Absolutely not!!!
reviews.comments: I bought this after Christmas thinking it would be a great protector for my hair but no!! It made my hair very frizzy and made me smell like a wet dog the whole day after using it. If I could give negative stars, I would!!

reviews.headline: Terrible Smell
reviews.comments: I'm a hairdresser and usually love Kenra products but this product smells so bad it outweighs any pros.

reviews.headline: Not sure I would buy again
reviews.comments: This works with curling and protecting your hair, if you can handle the smell of it. I will be looking for another spray protector but hopefully with a better smell

reviews.headline: Perfect for fine hair
reviews.comments: I love this product!  I spray it on my fine hair after blow drying.  After it dries, I brush my hair and then use my flatiron.  It gives me a little more hold that I need for my fine hair.  This has become a must have product for me!

reviews.headline: Name is Deceiving
reviews.comments: I bought this thinking it would protect my hair from blow drying. It's for hair that is already dry. I suppose if I did a blow out then used another hot tool, it might be ok.

reviews.headline: My go-to since the first purchase!
reviews.comments: This product is fantastic!  It is a great heat protectant and provides some hold for when I use my curling iron or deep waver.  While it isn't really meant for use with a straightener, I use it for that anyway because it helps keep my hair from curling back up during the day.  I have naturally curly hair and it doesn't like staying straight, but it will stay straight all day if I use this while straightening it.  Once my hair cools off, I just run my fingers through it and my hair is back to being soft and pliable.  Highly recommend this product.

reviews.headline: Crunchy, sticky and stinks
reviews.comments: Wanted to love this. I have been looking for a good heat protectant to use on dry hair and have liked Kenra products in the past. This feels like hairspray and doesnt leave your hair soft after. Curling irons and straightners do not run over the hair easily after using and the hair feels stiff. Also the smell reminds me of an air freahner in a public bathroom, not what I want to smell on myself all day.

reviews.headline: Threw it away
reviews.comments: I tried to give this a chance because I like most Kenra products. This made my hair the opposite of healthy-looking and smooth. It has the same consistency as a high-hold hairspray and does not allow iron to glide easily. I felt like this built up on my hair and caused it to feel and look dry, and im not sure if the heat protection worked well because my hair did look damaged.

media.headline: This is hair spray not heat appliance protectant

faceoff_positive.comments: This by far is the BEST heat protection and finishing spray I have ever come across. It has so many different uses. The scent is very nice, the mist dries instantly once applied and you can still run your fingers through your hair with no build up. Your hair releases so nice from a straight iron and add a beautiful shine to the hair...just gorgeous. Is also a great finishing spray once style is achieved with medium hold... also adds great volume..especially for me who has long hair and loves volume on top.
faceoff_positive.headline: Just WOW

faceoff_negative.comments:
I was disappointed when I got this home. I find the product description extremely misleading. Its called heat block spray which seems like it would be a heat protector for straightening and curling etc.. So I washed & blow dried my hair and as my flat iron was heating up I sprayed a section of my hair and the texture was sticky and coarse like hair spray. It was impossible to straighten more or less run my fingers through the sprayed section.. It frustrated me, and I ended up just throwing my hair in a bun and not styling how I was planning that day. 

Now, using it as a light weight hair spray is great.. But I already had one (and it was properly labeled as hair spray) and didn't need another one. They should really change the name of this product and call it was it is because it is certainly not anything like a "heat blocker".
faceoff_negative.headline: Misleading product description.
